@Fernoth, go to the CDVD section, then click on the Iso Selector, then direct the software to the iso file you want to emulate, after your selection, go to the System section, click on the Boot CDVD (fast) and game kicks over; you only need to do this one time and the next time it will remember the iso path, once you have done this a couple of times, it's like muscle memory; PCSX2 is the most simple emulator out there, once you toy around with the basics, it's very simple, but not all PS2 games can be emulated, so there is a limited range.
